titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.
Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-753, by Mr. Sessions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 243.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-753, by Mr. Sessions.

bill.summary: Makes it in order at any time on October 7, 2004, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
